classification_result.reasoning: The document presents a telecommunications bill from Telecom Italia with monetary transactions, tax information, and service descriptions typical of an expense document.

line_items.description: (iPhone) Piano 12 Mesi Minuti illim. testi illim. 10 GB

extraction_result.additional_info: Il tuo conto in banca verrà addebitato con l'intero saldo che si riflette su questa dichiarazione sulla 1 Febbraio 2014.

issues.description: The supplier name on the receipt is 'Telecom Italia S.p.A.', which does not match the mandatory supplier name 'Global People s.r.l.' for ICP Global People.
issues.recommendation: It is recommended to address this issue with the supplier or provider.

issues.description: The supplier address provided does not match the mandatory address 'Via Venti Settembre 3, Torino (TO) CAP 10121, Italy' for ICP Global People.
issues.recommendation: It is recommended to address this issue with the supplier or provider.
issues.knowledge_base_reference: Via Venti Settembre 3, Torino (TO) CAP 10121, Italy

issues.description: The VAT number is missing on the receipt, whereas 'IT12455930011' is a mandatory requirement for ICP Global People.
issues.recommendation: It is recommended to obtain the correct VAT number from the supplier or provider.

issues.description: The payment method is not traceable as it is missing from the receipt. A mandatory requirement is a traceable method such as bank transfers or credit/debit cards.
issues.recommendation: It is recommended to ask the supplier to provide a receipt with an appropriate payment method.
issues.knowledge_base_reference: Must be traceable: bank transfers, postal transfers, credit/debit cards, prepaid cards, bank/cashier's checks

issues.description: The Italian Tax Code (C.F.) is missing, contrary to requirement for Global People s.r.l. where the code '12455930011' is mandatory.
issues.recommendation: It is recommended to obtain the correct tax code from the supplier or provider.

validation_result.compliance_summary: The receipt has multiple compliance issues related to missing mandatory fields essential for tax and business expense documentation according to Italy's rules specific to Global People's policies.
